Sources:
Peer to peer, deterministic, cheat protection
https://www.gamedeveloper.com/programming/1500-archers-on-a-28-8-network-programming-in-age-of-empires-and-beyond
Cheat protection: "Because the game's outcome depended on all of the users executing exactly the same simulation, it was extremely difficult to hack a client (or client communication stream) and cheat. Any simulation that ran differently was tagged as "out of sync" and the game stopped."

"We build the game based on Peer-to-Peer tech, so for PvP we would probably need a dedicated server structure."
